#AliaBhatt has had a stratospheric year. Armed with an undeniable charm, Vogue Singapore‚Äôs October digital cover star is now on a journey that can only be described as a global takeover‚Äîand the resounding love for Bollywood in Singapore is one to add to the list. 

The enigmatic star‚Äôs recent repertoire boasts some of the biggest hits of her career, from the leading role in director Sanjay Leela Bhansali‚Äôs Gangubai Kathiawadi to being named Italian luxury label #Gucci‚Äôs first and only South Asian brand ambassador. Hot off the heels of Karan Johar‚Äôs blockbuster hit Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani, Bhatt delves into her journey thus far, from the importance of South Asian representation to the mentors she holds close to her heart. The full interview, now in the link in bio. #VogueSingapore
